snippet: Back as the coach of the U.S. men’s team, Arena distanced himself from his remarks in recent years questioning the patriotism of foreign-born players....
abstract: Jere Longman On Soccer column holds that United States men's national soccer team coach Bruce Arena's stated preference for fielding team of home-grown players raises questions about future of its foreign-born players as team seeks to qualify for 2018 World Cup.
lead_paragraph: Back as the coach of the U.S. men’s team, Arena distanced himself from his remarks in recent years questioning the patriotism of foreign-born players.

headline.print_headline: Arena’s Comments Show Shift in View of Foreign-Born Players
headline.main: Bruce Arena Adopts More Inclusive Tone on Foreign-Born Players

keywords.name: organizations
keywords.value: United States Men's National Soccer Team
